me nisa wariyapola shri‡∑ära sumangala himi wira namaya lanka ithihasaye ran akurin liyawi muwak pasa diwa ma thurak se sajiwi wa adath pawathinne ya.mihindu maha rahathan wahanse sirilakata wadama kirimen aarambha wu, silayen, pragnyawen saha gunayen janathawata aadarshayek wu maha sanga ruwana eda sita rajawarunta anushasana kirima, janatha santhanaya lowuthuru gunayen prabhawath kirima menma rata, jathiya sathbudu sasuna aaraksha kota poshanaya kirima wani lak janathawage siyalu janatha abhimathartha ishta siddha kala aakaraya wasanawak ma wiya.apa deshiye swabhawaya, sabhyathwaya pilibanda nisi awabodhayak nathiwa ingi‡∑ärasin wisin sidukala palanaya nisa athi wu apamana karali kolahalawalin kri.wa. 1818 di athi wu udarata karalla pradhana ya.

emenma aya siya upadhi nibandhayata wiwidha wargaye kawi saha katha da boho pramanayak amuna thibuyen ayata usas samarthayak di nawatha upan gampalatha wetha waidyawariyak lesa balaganwa ewa thibuni.aya da sahabhagi wu mema majik sandarshanaya awasanaye di aya wisin ee kawiya ragena aa kandayame kenekuta kiwe thama wisin min pera anawaki kiyana lada majik shilpiya me wiya yuthu bawayi.pettiyaka lu gahaniyak pana pitin dekata kapannata samath minihekuta me lowa oonama deyak kala haki bawa mema waidyawariya ema kandayamata siya shalya waidya widya danumen eeththu ganwuwaya.min kupitha wu dhana kuwerayan methuwak thaman amandanandayata path kala kawiya alla rajaye mahamathyadinta chodanabhimukhawa penwa siragatha karannata wadakatayuthu kalen siya sikuru dasawe rahu anthar dashawa uda wi athi bawa kawiya dana nogaththa da eya rathri ahase tharuka panthi athara satahan wa thibuneya.siragathawa hun kawiya dinak sira madiri biththiye kalakata pera sitiyawun wisin liya thibu wakiyak kiyawamin sitiyadi siragedara jelarwarayeku nirikshana satahanak log pothe dama gos thibune kawiya notherena bhashawakin noyek de siragedara biththi matha liyana bawath eewa wahama parikshawata lak kala yuthu bawath ya.enayin in pasuwadama hiragedarata wan akshara wishleshana maha pragnyayan pirisakage nirdeshayen waha kandawu mahadhikarana balathala sahitha eeka pudgala kamituwaka thiranaya wuye kawiya wiwidha janatha nagitim walata thudu dena apabhransha wiplawawadi kawi wisheshayak liya athi bawath ohu desha drohiyaku bawath ohu waha kriyathmaka wana paridi prathama ella marime sandarshanayedima ella mara damiya yuthu bawathya.majik shilpiya kawiyeku lesath wirodhara wiplawawadi wimukthikamiyaku lesath sujatha puthrayan athin miya giye eseya.
